component.name: Basic Table
component.description: A foundational table component for displaying tabular data with headers, rows, and columns in organized format. Supports sorting, filtering, pagination, and responsive behavior while maintaining clarity and accessibility for effective data presentation.

variants.name: Minimalism
variants.description: A well-structured table implementation featuring clear headers, organized rows, responsive scrolling, and intuitive controls. Provides effective tabular data visualization with intuitive interaction patterns for data browsing and exploration across all devices.

variants.name: Bootstrap 5
variants.description: Basic Table implementation in Bootstrap 5 style

variants.name: Neo Brutalism
variants.description: Basic Table implementation in Neo Brutalism style

variants.name: Glassmorphism
variants.description: Basic Table implementation in Glassmorphism style

variants.name: Neumorphism
variants.description: Basic Table implementation in Neumorphism style
